review: I highly recommend this to anybody.Me and my family enjoy using our Chromecast everyday. My siblings are always using it to watch YouTube videos with each other. It's so easy to use that even my 5-year-old brother understands how to use it.The available apps may seem a little limited, but it's only just beginning. Besides, all the major apps, like YouTube, Netflix, Hulu Plus, and HBO Go, are already available.
